original_title: あながちまちがってるともいえない空
overview: The enormous amount of modern stars surrounding us is not a fantastic sparkle of light, but a litter of false information. The "I" in this film collects messages from an imaginary research company. A unique personal film that confronts the fictionalised reality on an equal level. (IFF, 1996).
title: The Place Which Isn’t Necessarily Wrong
